name: Grain by Grain
description:
AMAZING SAND ART GAME!!!

Draw with colored sand, water and rock in this beautiful particles simulation game!

- Convert photos and pictures to sand art!
- Just drag the mouse to create magnificent art inside bottles. You can use colored sand, water and rock!
- Relaxing, beautiful, physics-based environments!
- Amazing high definition graphics!
- Save your art in your Mac and share with friends.

- Please visit www.arphix.com to get more games!
